content.text:
# Czech Republic and the European Union

The Czech Republic has been a member state of the European Union since the 2004 enlargement of the European Union. It is not a member of the eurozone.
Czechia's foreign relations with EU member states
*  Austria
*  Belgium
*  Bulgaria
*  Croatia
*  Cyprus
*  Denmark
*  Estonia
*  Finland
*  France
*  Germany
*  Greece
*  Hungary
*  Ireland
*  Italy
*  Latvia
*  Lithuania
*  Luxembourg
*  Malta
*  Netherlands
*  Poland
*  Portugal
*  Romania
*  Slovakia
*  Slovenia
*  Spain
*  Sweden
